name: NO Youtube Premium Button
description:
Removes the "Get YouTube Premium" button from the OLD youtube design.
	
Removes the "This version of YouTube is going away soon. Switch to the new YouTube" message.
additional_info:
to get the old youtube design:
1. open youtube.com in your browser
2. open the console (ctrl+shift+i)
3. copy this into the console and execute it</br>
document.cookie = document.cookie.split(' ').filter(o=>o.indexOf('PREF=')!==-1)[0].replace(';','')+'&f5=30030&f6=8;domain=.youtube.com;path=/';
</br>
4. restart your browser. u should now have the old youtube design.
